summary: My new mod dragons This mod increases the vanilla and add new dragons ...
descriptionHtml:
This is my new mod for dragons! This mod increases the vanilla and add new strong dragons.
I already know from my past fashion new dragons, the same thing but now with the gain and vanilla dragons. So far only added 16 new dragons, if events like publeke I will make more new!
Strong dragons also appear on the player\'s level as vanilla. (Then maybe it\'ll take)
What about vanilla but now they are much stronger and Owned by 2-3 times, and if you and this will seem a little, I will make them even angrier.Now the dragons will not always fly!

If you like fashion do not forget to support him!
[color=red]This mod requires Dawnguard!![/color]
[color=red]This mod requires Dragonborn!![/color]

Now to the details ..
--- New Dragons ---
Added 16 new dragons.
All of them can be found in eight locations.
They are stronger than the vanilla dragons game but my changes.
All of them special abilities, namely, health, or screams.
Support Dragonborn.
--- Vanilla Dragons ---
Base health increased from 500 to 1,500 additional.
Basic supply of magic grew to 2,500 additional.
Power bites, beats tail or wing 2-3 times more now.
Strengthened cries now they are much stronger than you.
Do not add dragons other any that screams, only the default value!
[color=red]Added new amplified sound dragons![/color]
--- Install ---
You can use the Nexus Mod Manager to install.
Manual ..
Copy the entire contents of the folder Evil dragons and new Dragons in his file date.
If you do not want new dragons that do not copy EDND-New dragons.esp
The same goes with EDND-Evil dragons.esp if you do not need!
--- Delete ---
Remove all the mod files.

--- Author ---
esey
Bethesda
author: esey
